SEARCH
Package org.redfx.strange

Class Step

java.lang.Object
org.redfx.strange.Step
public class Step extends Object
A single Step in a quantum Program. In a step, a number of Gates can be added, involving a number of qubits. However, in a single step a qubit can be involved in at most one Gate. It is illegal to declare 2 gates in a single step that operate on the same qubit.
Version:
$Id: $Id
Author:
johan

    • addGate

      public void addGate(Gate gate) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Add gate to the list of gates for this step
      Parameters:
      gate - gate to add
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - in case the supplied Gate operates on a qubit that is already been operated on in this step
